ComicInfo.Summary: OverviewThe most stunning revelation ever seen in the pages of Spawn! Behind the scenes of human history, one man has been pulling the strings. Now at last, Mammon's plans come to deadly fruition.The revelations come thick and fast as Nyx becomes the unwilling host for Spawn's costume. Mammon finally reveals his true purpose, and we learn the horrifying secret of Morana's true identity. There will be blood!
ComicInfo.Tags: Man of Miracles,Cyan,Hiroshi Kitamura,Nyx,Granny Blake,Spawn (Simmons),Kumiko Kitamura,Mammon,Wanda Fitzgerald,Christopher Welland,Morana
ComicInfo.Title: Transformations
